creator: milamber@apache.org
text: JMeter needs  some improvements for the html report design (colors, images, look and feel), adds 2 extra fields : date of report and ability to add a title (via a property), and changes url of JMeter's site.

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1302305&view=rev
Log:
Bug 52941 - Improvements of HTML report design generated by JMeter Ant task extra

Added:
    jmeter/trunk/extras/collapse.png   (with props)
    jmeter/trunk/extras/expand.png   (with props)

    jmeter/trunk/extras/collapse.jpg
    jmeter/trunk/extras/expand.jpg

creator: milamber@apache.org
text:
URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1302306&view=rev
Log:
Update ant-jmeter Jar
Log from http://www.programmerplanet.org/pages/projects/jmeter-ant-task.php
12/5/2011 - added jmeterlogfile attribute to support specifying the path to a JMeter log file
9/2/2011 - added remote attribute to <property> element to support sending properties to remote JMeter servers



URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=1302307&view=rev
Log:
Bug 52941 - Improvements of HTML report design generated by JMeter Ant task extra
JMeter Ant (ant-jmeter-1.1.1.jar) task was upgraded from 1.0.9 to 1.1.1

Modified:
    jmeter/trunk/xdocs/changes.xml
